title: Remove start screen inputs and enforce fixed player name "Priyanshi"

requirements.summary: Remove start/home personalization inputs and always greet the player as "Priyanshi" while keeping start progression unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On the start/home screen, there are no visible input controls for entering a name or other personalization text.
The start/home screen heading always greets the user as "Priyanshi" (i.e., it does not change based on any user input or saved profile).
Clicking the start button still progresses to the next level as before.

file_operations.description: Remove all personalization form UI (name input, dedication textarea, labels) and any related local state/handlers; make the greeting always use DEFAULT_NAME ("Priyanshi") with no user input; keep the Start button behavior and auth button behavior working as before.
Update StartLevel wiring/props as needed to match the simplified StartLevel implementation (no longer driven by editable personalization inputs), while keeping navigation to the next level unchanged.

requirements.summary: Force the in-game name to always be "Priyanshi" across state initialization, hydration from saved progress, and downstream displays (bonus/victory/keepsake).
acceptanceCriteria: After login and hydration from backend progress, the in-game name remains "Priyanshi" (saved name values do not override it).
Victory screen and keepsake card display "Priyanshi" as the name.

file_operations.description: Enforce a fixed name (DEFAULT_NAME) throughout game state: initialize personalization.name to DEFAULT_NAME, override any hydrated savedProgress.name with DEFAULT_NAME, ensure any progress persistence uses DEFAULT_NAME for the name, and ensure resets cannot result in a different name being stored in state.
Ensure the victory heading always renders DEFAULT_NAME ("Priyanshi") regardless of any personalization.name value passed in.
Ensure the keepsake card (and downloaded PNG name text via exportKeepsakePng) always uses DEFAULT_NAME ("Priyanshi") regardless of any personalization.name value passed in.
If the bonus screen renders the player's name anywhere, force it to display DEFAULT_NAME ("Priyanshi") so the bonus/victory/keepsake flow cannot show a different name.
